text: The following is a list of deaths that happened in October 2022. For deaths that should be noted before the month that the world is in, please see "Months". Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. Each listing of death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, where they came from, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known), and a source. == October == ===1=== *Antonio Inoki, 79, Japanese professional wrestler (NJPW) and politician.アントニオ猪木さん死去 79歳 *Toab Khan, 88, Bangladeshi journalist (Janakantha). *Max Baer, 74, American jurist, chief justice of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania (since 2021).Pa. Supreme Court Chief Justice Max Baer dies at 74 *Àngel Casas, 76, Spanish journalist, television talk show host and writer.Mor als 76 anys el mític periodista Àngel Casas, pioner del talk show a Catalunya ===2=== *Darshan Dharmaraj, 41, Sri Lankan actor (Prabhakaran, Ini Avan, Address Na), heart attack.Veteran actor Dharshan Dharmaraj passes away *Bjarne Mørk Eidem, 85, Norwegian politician, MP (1969–1993), minister of fisheries (1986–1989) and auditor general (1990–2005).Tidligere fiskeriminister Bjarne Mørk-Eidem er død *Éder Jofre, 86, Brazilian boxer, bantamweight (1960–1965) and WBC featherweight (1973–1974) champion, complications from pneumonia.Éder Jofre, ex-pugilista, morre aos 86 anos em SP *Rosetta Loy, 91, Italian writer, cardiac arrest.E' morta la scrittrice Rosetta Loy === 3 === *Ekow Blankson, 50, Ghanaian actor (Checkmate, Sun City).Veteran actor Ekow Blankson has passed on *Per Bredesen, 91, Norwegian footballer (Lazio, Ørn Horten, national team).Per Bredesen er død *David Huerta, 73, Mexican poet.Muere el poeta mexicano David Huerta *Jesús Quintero, 82, Spanish journalist, respiratory failure.Muere Jesús Quintero, el 'loco de la colina', a los 82 años *Pandurang Raut, 76, Indian politician, Goa MLA (1989–1994, 1999–2002).गोव्याचे माजी मंत्री पांडुरंग राऊत यांचे निधन *Jerzy Urban, 89, Polish journalist (Polityka, Nie) and writer.Jerzy Urban nie żyje. Miał 89 lat *Florin Zalomir, 41, Romanian fencer, Olympic silver medallist (2012).Florin Zalomir === 4 === *Ian Hamilton, 97, Scottish lawyer and independence activist (1950 removal of the Stone of Scone).Tributes paid to Ian Hamilton, advocate and 'liberator' of the Stone of Destiny *Loretta Lynn, 90, American Hall of Fame country singer-songwriter ("Coal Miner's Daughter", "You Ain't Woman Enough (To Take My Man)", "The Pill"), Grammy winner (1972, 2004).Loretta Lynn, Feisty First Lady of Country Music, Dies at 90 === 5 === *Wolfgang Kohlhaase, 91, German screenwriter (I Was Nineteen, Mama, I'm Alive) and film director (Solo Sunny).Filmlegende Wolfgang Kohlhaase gestorben ===6=== *Tekeste Baire, 69, Eritrean trade union activist (NCEW). *Ivy Jo Hunter, 82, American songwriter.Motown great Ivy Joe Hunter dies at age 82 *Noé Jitrik, 94, Argentine literary critic, stroke.Tenía 94 años. Falleció el ensayista y escritor Noé Jitrik *Sara Lee, 30, American professional wrestler (WWE).WWE Tough Enough winner Sara Lee has passed away *Jody Miller, 80, American country singer, Grammy winner (1966), Parkinson's disease.'Queen of the House' music artist Jody Miller dies *Phil Read, 83, English motorcycle racer, seven-time F.I.M. Road Racing champion.British great Phil Read dies aged 83 *Judy Tenuta, 72, American comedian, actress (The Weird Al Show), and musician, ovarian cancer.Judy Tenuta Dies: “Love Goddess” Comic & Actress Was 72 *Ankica Tuđman, 96, Croatian socialite.Ankica Tuđman, wife of the first Croatian president passes away === 7 === *Warren J. FSV Mainz 05) and manager (SV Wiesbaden).Früherer Mainz-05-Trainer und -Spieler Horst Hülß gestorben *Toshi Ichiyanagi, 89, Japanese composer and pianist.現代音楽界をリード、作曲家の一柳慧さん８９歳で死去…オノ・ヨーコさんと一時期結婚 *Shoshana Netanyahu, 99, Israeli lawyer, justice of the Supreme Court (1981–1993).Retired High Court judge Shoshana Netanyahu dies at 99 *Toru Ohno, 87, Japanese literary scholar.大野徹さん死去 *Cheryl Roberts, 60, South African Olympic table tennis player (1992), cancer.Icon Cheryl Roberts loses her battle with cancer *Jure Robežnik, 89, Slovenian pianist and composer.Umrl je Jure Robežnik, velikan zlate dobe slovenske popevke *Robert I.
